abstract: Nasdaq OMX Group boosted its short-term cost expectations on Wednesday, but outlined the longer-term growth it expects in the clearing and technology businesses — areas on which the exchange operator will lean in coming years.
snippet: Nasdaq OMX Group boosted its short-term cost expectations on Wednesday, but outlined the longer-term growth it expects in the clearing and technology businesses — areas on which the exchange operator will lean in coming years.
lead_paragraph: The Nasdaq OMX Group increased its short-term cost expectations on Wednesday but outlined the longer-term growth it expects in the clearing and technology businesses — areas on which the exchange operator will lean in coming years, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Nasdaq Raises Cost Forecast and Sees Revenue Growth
